ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 3 teaspoons baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup butter, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, 1   +   1/2 cups white sugar, 4  eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon almond extract, 1 cup maraschino cherries, drained and halved,   +   1/4 cup all-purpose flour
nutrition: Total Fat 24g 31%, Saturated Fat 14g 72%, Cholesterol 123mg 41%, Sodium 375mg 16%, Total Carbohydrate 50g 18%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 25g, Protein 6g, Calcium 85mg 7%, Iron 2mg 10%, Potassium 102mg 2%
